descriptionSet.description: A collection of four picture postcards: The first one on the upper left shows Mr. B.R. Dutt in hunger strike, protesting against the bad conditions for political prisoners. A man with a halo around his head is standing next to him. On the right, a woman can be seen on the shores of a river, seemingly having an unusual encounter with a ghost carrying his own head on a plate. The lower left image shows Mata India, India's geo body, in her typical iconography, with tricolor flag and spinning wheel. The last image on the lower right shows a couple of men, partly wearing flower garlands and bindis. All four images carry different information concerning their publishers.

inscription.text: Fighting for the emancipation of Political Prisoners.
Mr. B. R. Dutt on hunger strike "The mission of late Jatin who died fighting for the betterment of Political Prisoners must be fought to the finished." Imperial Picture House Anarkali Lahore
No. 2004 Copyright Coronattion Press Cawnpore Publishers. Ganganarian Beharilal, Post Box No. 57 Cawnpore
Sri Bharat Mata Punjabi Press, Delhi

location.name: Delhi / The Priya Paul Collection of Popular Art
Delhi / The Priya Paul Collection of Popular Art

rights.text: Copyrighted. Copyright with the original artists and publishers.

titleSet.title: four postcards with nationalist themes, including mother India on a map of India

description-en: A collection of four picture postcards: The first one on the upper left shows Mr. B.R. Dutt in hunger strike, protesting against the bad conditions for political prisoners. A man with a halo around his head is standing next to him. On the right, a woman can be seen on the shores of a river, seemingly having an unusual encounter with a ghost carrying his own head on a plate. The lower left image shows Mata India, India's geo body, in her typical iconography, with tricolor flag and spinning wheel. The last image on the lower right shows a couple of men, partly wearing flower garlands and bindis. All four images carry different information concerning their publishers. (gs)
